Notes: Entry-level position for MBBS graduates after completing 1-year UAE internship. Salaries vary by emirate (DHA Dubai, DOH Abu Dhabi, MOH Northern Emirates). Base salary only - housing and transport allowances (20-40% additional) typically provided separately.

Private hospitals generally pay 10-20% more than government facilities. Additional benefits often include annual flight tickets, education allowance for dependents. Housing allowance ranges AED 1500-3000/month extra.

Mid-level position for doctors with 2-5 years post-internship experience. Government positions offer job stability and structured progression. Base salary excludes housing (AED 3000-5000/month) and transport allowances (AED 1500-2500/month).

Private sector offers higher base salaries and performance-based bonuses (5-15% annual). Benefits package includes housing, transport, annual leave tickets, and medical coverage for family. Overtime opportunities common in private hospitals.

Requires MD/MS degree and 5+ years experience. Specialist positions in government hospitals (DHA/DOH) require board certification or equivalent. Salary includes 4-5% annual increments. Additional income from on-call duties (AED 500-1000/shift).

Private hospitals pay premium for in-demand specialties (cardiology, orthopedics, radiology). Total compensation package can reach 150-180% of base with allowances. Performance bonuses 10-20% of annual salary. On-call premium rates.

Senior position requiring 10+ years experience and fellowship/board certification. Government consultant roles include teaching responsibilities at medical colleges. Comprehensive benefits: housing allowance (AED 8000-12000/month), education allowance (up to AED 25000/year per child), annual leave tickets for family.

Top-tier private hospitals (NMC, Mediclinic, Emirates, Burjeel) offer premium packages for experienced consultants. Revenue-sharing arrangements common (5-15% of consultation fees). Negotiable benefits include luxury housing, car allowance (AED 3000-5000/month), conference attendance, CME funding.
